h3cRpr.name: h3cRpr
h3cRpr.contactinfo: Platform Team Huawei 3Com Technologies Co., Ltd. Hai-Dian District Beijing P.R. China http://www.huawei-3com.com Zip:100085
h3cRpr.description: This MIB manages RPR(Resilient Packet Ring)interfaces by providing an operational table which controls parameters of each RPR interface and reports alarm conditions. A RPR ring is composed of two fiber rings: Outer and Inner.

H3cRprRingletID.name: H3cRprRingletID
H3cRprRingletID.description: Indicates the path on which data flow is selected. The valid value is ringlet0 and ringlet1. They indicate two RPR fiber rings. Ringlet0 refers to outer ring and ringlet1 refers to inner ring.
H3cRprRingletID.reference: IEEE 802.17 V3.3 Subclause 11.2.1.1 Span and ringlet parameterization.

H3cRprServiceClass.name: H3cRprServiceClass
H3cRprServiceClass.description: Indicates the service class of RPR. The valid value is ClassC, ClassB, ClassA1 and ClassA0.

h3cRprMaxmumDefineTable.name: h3cRprMaxmumDefineTable
h3cRprMaxmumDefineTable.description: This table contains the specs of RPR ring.

h3cRprMaxmumDefineEntry.name: h3cRprMaxmumDefineEntry
h3cRprMaxmumDefineEntry.description: The entry of RPR Maximum Table.

h3cRprMaxMumIfIndex.name: h3cRprMaxMumIfIndex
h3cRprMaxMumIfIndex.description: The ifIndex of this RPR interface.

h3cRprMaxStationNumDefine.name: h3cRprMaxStationNumDefine
h3cRprMaxStationNumDefine.description: Max station number supported by RPR ring.

h3cRprMaxReservedRateDefine.name: h3cRprMaxReservedRateDefine
h3cRprMaxReservedRateDefine.description: Max reserved rate supported by each RPR ringlet. An estimate of the interface's current bandwidth in units of 1,000,000 bits per second. If this object reports a value of 'n' then the speed of the interface is somewhere in the range of 'n-500,000' to 'n+499,999'. For interfaces which do not vary in bandwidth or for those where no accurate estimation can be made, this object should contain the nominal bandwidth. For a sub-layer which has no concept of bandwidth, this object should be zero.

h3cRprTopoImageXTable.name: h3cRprTopoImageXTable
h3cRprTopoImageXTable.description: This table contains additional objects for the rprTopoImageTable in IEEE-802DOT17-RPR-MIB.

h3cRprTopoImageXEntry.name: h3cRprTopoImageXEntry
h3cRprTopoImageXEntry.description: Each entry contains information specific to a particular station on the ring. The table has at least one entry for the station itself, this entry indicates zero hops on each ringlet.

h3cRprTopoImageXWestEdgeStatus.name: h3cRprTopoImageXWestEdgeStatus
h3cRprTopoImageXWestEdgeStatus.description: The current edge status of the west span. If an edge exists,the h3cRprTopoImageXWestEdgeStatus is true. Otherwise, the h3cRprTopoImageXWestEdgeStatus is false.

h3cRprTopoImageXEastEdgeStatus.name: h3cRprTopoImageXEastEdgeStatus
h3cRprTopoImageXEastEdgeStatus.description: The current edge status of the east span. If an edge exists, the h3cRprTopoImageXEastEdgeStatus is true. Otherwise, the h3cRprTopoImageXEastEdgeStatus is false.

h3cRprTopoImageXStationName.name: h3cRprTopoImageXStationName
h3cRprTopoImageXStationName.description: The operator assigned station name. The operator can assigned it by h3cRprTopoImageXStationName.

h3cRprSrcMacCountTable.name: h3cRprSrcMacCountTable
h3cRprSrcMacCountTable.description: The RPR Source Mac Count Table contains the cumulative sum of frames and octects from the particular source station.

h3cRprSrcMacCountEntry.name: h3cRprSrcMacCountEntry
h3cRprSrcMacCountEntry.description: An entry in the RPR Source Mac Count Table.

h3cRprSrcMacCountIfIndex.name: h3cRprSrcMacCountIfIndex
h3cRprSrcMacCountIfIndex.description: The ifIndex of this RPR interface.

h3cRprSrcMacCountBySrcAddress.name: h3cRprSrcMacCountBySrcAddress
h3cRprSrcMacCountBySrcAddress.description: MAC address of the source station where the frames come from.

h3cRprSrcMacCountReceivedFrames.name: h3cRprSrcMacCountReceivedFrames
h3cRprSrcMacCountReceivedFrames.description: Frames received from a particular MAC address of source station.

h3cRprSrcMacCountReceivedOctets.name: h3cRprSrcMacCountReceivedOctets
h3cRprSrcMacCountReceivedOctets.description: Octets received from a particular MAC address of source station.

h3cRprDestMacCountTable.name: h3cRprDestMacCountTable
h3cRprDestMacCountTable.description: The RPR Destination MAC Count Table contains the cumulative sum of frames and octects to the particular destination station.

h3cRprDestMacCountEntry.name: h3cRprDestMacCountEntry
h3cRprDestMacCountEntry.description: An entry in the RPR MAC Destination Count Table.

h3cRprDestMacCountByDestAddress.name: h3cRprDestMacCountByDestAddress
h3cRprDestMacCountByDestAddress.description: MAC address of the destination station where the frames are sent to.

h3cRprDestMacCountReceivedFrames.name: h3cRprDestMacCountReceivedFrames
h3cRprDestMacCountReceivedFrames.description: Frames sent to a particular MAC address of destination station.

h3cRprDestMacCountReceivedOctets.name: h3cRprDestMacCountReceivedOctets
h3cRprDestMacCountReceivedOctets.description: Octets sent to a particular MAC address of destination station.

h3cRprPktDropCountTable.name: h3cRprPktDropCountTable
h3cRprPktDropCountTable.description: The RPR Packet Drop Count Table contains the cumulative sum of packets dropped for congestion.

h3cRprPktDropCountEntry.name: h3cRprPktDropCountEntry
h3cRprPktDropCountEntry.description: An entry in the RPR Packet Drop Count Table.

h3cRprPktDropCntIfIndex.name: h3cRprPktDropCntIfIndex
h3cRprPktDropCntIfIndex.description: The ifIndex of this RPR interface.

h3cRprPktDropCntRingletID.name: h3cRprPktDropCntRingletID
h3cRprPktDropCntRingletID.description: The RPR Ringlet of the station through which the packets transmit.

h3cRprDownFlowClassAPktDrops.name: h3cRprDownFlowClassAPktDrops
h3cRprDownFlowClassAPktDrops.description: The total dropped number of Class A packets which transmit down from the host.

h3cRprUpFlowClassAPktDrops.name: h3cRprUpFlowClassAPktDrops
h3cRprUpFlowClassAPktDrops.description: The total dropped number of Class A packets which transmit up to the host.

h3cRprDownFlowClassBPktDrops.name: h3cRprDownFlowClassBPktDrops
h3cRprDownFlowClassBPktDrops.description: The total dropped number of Class B packets which transmit down from the host.

h3cRprUpFlowClassBPktDrops.name: h3cRprUpFlowClassBPktDrops
h3cRprUpFlowClassBPktDrops.description: The total dropped number of Class B packets which transmit up to the host.

h3cRprDownFlowClassCPktDrops.name: h3cRprDownFlowClassCPktDrops
h3cRprDownFlowClassCPktDrops.description: The total dropped number of Class C packets which transmit down from the host.

h3cRprUpFlowClassCPktDrops.name: h3cRprUpFlowClassCPktDrops
h3cRprUpFlowClassCPktDrops.description: The total dropped number of Class C packets which transmit up to the host.

h3cRprStaticRSTable.name: h3cRprStaticRSTable
h3cRprStaticRSTable.description: The RPR Static Ring Selection table contains the static ring selection information by the way of configuration.

h3cRprStaticRSEntry.name: h3cRprStaticRSEntry
h3cRprStaticRSEntry.description: An entry in the RPR Static Ring Selection table.

h3cRprStaticRSMacAddress.name: h3cRprStaticRSMacAddress
h3cRprStaticRSMacAddress.description: The MAC address of the station on the ring.

h3cRprStaticRSRingletID.name: h3cRprStaticRSRingletID
h3cRprStaticRSRingletID.description: The identifier of the ring which frames are sent from one station to another. Ringlet0 refers to outer ring, while ringlet1 does inner.

h3cRprStaticRSTtl.name: h3cRprStaticRSTtl
h3cRprStaticRSTtl.description: The hops from source station to destination station by the selected ringlet.

h3cRprStaticRSValid.name: h3cRprStaticRSValid
h3cRprStaticRSValid.description: The flag identify whether the configed ringlet is valid. If it is true, the configed ringlet is valid, otherwise it's invalid.

h3cRprStaticRSRowStatus.name: h3cRprStaticRSRowStatus
h3cRprStaticRSRowStatus.description: The status of this table entry. The status includes createAndGo, active and destroy.

h3cRprIpv4DynamicRSTable.name: h3cRprIpv4DynamicRSTable
h3cRprIpv4DynamicRSTable.description: The RPR Ipv4Dynamic Ring Selection Table that contains the dynamic ring selection information by shortest path.

h3cRprIpv4DynamicRSEntry.name: h3cRprIpv4DynamicRSEntry
h3cRprIpv4DynamicRSEntry.description: An entry in the RPR Ipv4Dynamic Ring Selection Table.

h3cRprIpv4DynamicRSMacAddress.name: h3cRprIpv4DynamicRSMacAddress
h3cRprIpv4DynamicRSMacAddress.description: The Ipv4 MAC address of destination station on the ring.

h3cRprIpv4DynamicRSRingletID.name: h3cRprIpv4DynamicRSRingletID
h3cRprIpv4DynamicRSRingletID.description: The identifier of the ring which frames are sent from the source station to the destination station.

h3cRprIpv4DynamicRSTtl.name: h3cRprIpv4DynamicRSTtl
h3cRprIpv4DynamicRSTtl.description: The hops from source station to destination station by the selected ringlet.

h3cRprIpv6DynamicRSTable.name: h3cRprIpv6DynamicRSTable
h3cRprIpv6DynamicRSTable.description: The RPR Ipv6 Dynamic Ring Selection Table that contains the Ipv6 ring selection information by dynamic ring selection and static ring selection.

h3cRprIpv6DynamicRSEntry.name: h3cRprIpv6DynamicRSEntry
h3cRprIpv6DynamicRSEntry.description: An entry in the RPR Ipv6 Ring Selection Table.

h3cRprIpv6DynamicRSMacAddress.name: h3cRprIpv6DynamicRSMacAddress
h3cRprIpv6DynamicRSMacAddress.description: The Ipv6 MAC address of the destination station on the ring.

h3cRprIpv6DynamicRSRingletID.name: h3cRprIpv6DynamicRSRingletID
h3cRprIpv6DynamicRSRingletID.description: The identifier of the ring which frames are sent from the source station to the destination station.

h3cRprIpv6DynamicRSTtl.name: h3cRprIpv6DynamicRSTtl
h3cRprIpv6DynamicRSTtl.description: The hops from source station to destination station by selected ringlet.

h3cRprIpv4OverallRSTable.name: h3cRprIpv4OverallRSTable
h3cRprIpv4OverallRSTable.description: The RPR Ipv4 Overall Ring Selection Table that contains the overall and active ring selection infomation by dynamic ring selection and static ring selection.

h3cRprIpv4OverallRSEntry.name: h3cRprIpv4OverallRSEntry
h3cRprIpv4OverallRSEntry.description: An entry in the RPR Overall Ring Selection Table.

h3cRprIpv4OverallRSMacAddress.name: h3cRprIpv4OverallRSMacAddress
h3cRprIpv4OverallRSMacAddress.description: The MAC address of the destination station on the ring.

h3cRprIpv4OverallRSType.name: h3cRprIpv4OverallRSType
h3cRprIpv4OverallRSType.description: The ring selection item type indicates static or dynamic.

h3cRprIpv4OverallRSRingletID.name: h3cRprIpv4OverallRSRingletID
h3cRprIpv4OverallRSRingletID.description: The identifier of the ring which frames are sent from the source station to the destination station.

h3cRprIpv4OverallRSTtl.name: h3cRprIpv4OverallRSTtl
h3cRprIpv4OverallRSTtl.description: The hops from source station to destination station by selected ringlet.

h3cRprVrrpRSTable.name: h3cRprVrrpRSTable
h3cRprVrrpRSTable.description: The RPR VRRP Ring Selection Table that contains the ring selection information when the vrrp group is configured.

h3cRprVrrpRSEntry.name: h3cRprVrrpRSEntry
h3cRprVrrpRSEntry.description: An entry in the RPR VRRP Ring Selection Table.

h3cRprVrrpRSVirtualMacAddress.name: h3cRprVrrpRSVirtualMacAddress
h3cRprVrrpRSVirtualMacAddress.description: The virtual MAC address of the staion in VRRP group.

h3cRprVrrpRSMacAddress.name: h3cRprVrrpRSMacAddress
h3cRprVrrpRSMacAddress.description: The MAC address of the station that is the master in VRRP group.

h3cRprVrrpRSRingletID.name: h3cRprVrrpRSRingletID
h3cRprVrrpRSRingletID.description: The identifier of the ring which frames are sent from the source station to the destination station.

h3cRprVrrpRSTtl.name: h3cRprVrrpRSTtl
h3cRprVrrpRSTtl.description: The hops from source station to destination station by selected ringlet.

h3cRprDefaultRingIDTable.name: h3cRprDefaultRingIDTable
h3cRprDefaultRingIDTable.description: The RPR Default RingID Table specify the default ringID.

h3cRprDefaultRingIDEntry.name: h3cRprDefaultRingIDEntry
h3cRprDefaultRingIDEntry.description: An entry in the RPR Default RingID Table.

h3cRprDefaultConfigRingletID.name: h3cRprDefaultConfigRingletID
h3cRprDefaultConfigRingletID.description: The default identifier of the ring configured by user.

h3cRprDefaultActiveRingID.name: h3cRprDefaultActiveRingID
h3cRprDefaultActiveRingID.description: The identifier of the default ring which is active currently. The default ring configured by user may be inactive.

h3cRprDefectReportTable.name: h3cRprDefectReportTable
h3cRprDefectReportTable.description: The RPR Defect Report Table that contains the trap information on the ring.

h3cRprDefectReportEntry.name: h3cRprDefectReportEntry
h3cRprDefectReportEntry.description: An entry in the RPR Defect Report Table.

h3cRprDefectCurrentStatus.name: h3cRprDefectCurrentStatus
h3cRprDefectCurrentStatus.description: Indicates the current status of RPR ring. This attribute is used to notify the management system that alarms generate or clear about some RPR ring.

h3cRprPriority2ClassMapTable.name: h3cRprPriority2ClassMapTable
h3cRprPriority2ClassMapTable.description: The Table is for Class Of Service and RPR Service Class Mapping.

h3cRprPriority2ClassMapEntry.name: h3cRprPriority2ClassMapEntry
h3cRprPriority2ClassMapEntry.description: An entry in the COS to Service Class Map Table.

h3cRprPriority2ClassMapType.name: h3cRprPriority2ClassMapType
h3cRprPriority2ClassMapType.description: The type of Priority,include tag, mpls, ip.

h3cRprPriorityValue.name: h3cRprPriorityValue
h3cRprPriorityValue.description: The priority of tag,mpls and ip, the value range is 0~7.

h3cRprRateLimitConfigTable.name: h3cRprRateLimitConfigTable
h3cRprRateLimitConfigTable.description: The RPR Rate Limit Configuration Table that contains the rate limit infomation of RPR serviec class.

h3cRprRateLimitConfigEntry.name: h3cRprRateLimitConfigEntry
h3cRprRateLimitConfigEntry.description: An entry in the RPR Rate Limit Configuration Table.

h3cRprRateLimitConfigRingletId.name: h3cRprRateLimitConfigRingletId
h3cRprRateLimitConfigRingletId.description: The identifier of the ring of RPR ringlet.

h3cRprRateLimitConfigValue.name: h3cRprRateLimitConfigValue
h3cRprRateLimitConfigValue.description: The value of rate-limit that configured for diffrent service class. The unit is permillage.

h3cRprMacLearnCfgEntry.name: h3cRprMacLearnCfgEntry
h3cRprMacLearnCfgEntry.description: The entry of RPR MAC Address Table.

h3cRprMacLearnRprMac.name: h3cRprMacLearnRprMac
h3cRprMacLearnRprMac.description: The MAC address of the RPR station.

h3cRprMacLearnType.name: h3cRprMacLearnType
h3cRprMacLearnType.description: The type of MAC address item that the user built. The type includes static and dynamic.

h3cRprMacLearnVlanId.name: h3cRprMacLearnVlanId
h3cRprMacLearnVlanId.description: The vlan ID that the MAC address learned from by RPR staion.

h3cRprMacLearnRinglet.name: h3cRprMacLearnRinglet
h3cRprMacLearnRinglet.description: The identifier of the ring which frames are sent from the source station to the destination station.

h3cRprMacLearnTtl.name: h3cRprMacLearnTtl
h3cRprMacLearnTtl.description: The hops from source station to destination station on the selected ringlet.

h3cRprMacLearnIsValid.name: h3cRprMacLearnIsValid
h3cRprMacLearnIsValid.description: The flag identify whether the configured mac address is valid. If it is true, the configured mac address is valid, otherwise it's invalid.

h3cRprMacLearnRowStatus.name: h3cRprMacLearnRowStatus
h3cRprMacLearnRowStatus.description: The status of this table entry. The status includes createAndGo, active and destroy.

h3cRprTrapVarTable.name: h3cRprTrapVarTable
h3cRprTrapVarTable.description: The RPR Defect Report Table that contains varible that used to bind in trap.

h3cRprTrapVarEntry.name: h3cRprTrapVarEntry
h3cRprTrapVarEntry.description: An entry in the RPR Trap Var Table.

h3cRprTrapIfIndex.name: h3cRprTrapIfIndex
h3cRprTrapIfIndex.description: The ifIndex of RPR interface. It is only used for trap to bind.

h3cRprTrapRinglet.name: h3cRprTrapRinglet
h3cRprTrapRinglet.description: The span of RPR station. It is only used for trap to bind.

h3cRprTrapTopoMacAddress.name: h3cRprTrapTopoMacAddress
h3cRprTrapTopoMacAddress.description: The MAC address of RPR station. It is only used for trap to bind.

h3cRprTrapIpAddress.name: h3cRprTrapIpAddress
h3cRprTrapIpAddress.description: The IP address of RPR station. It is only used for trap to bind.

h3cRprTopologyOpenRing.name: h3cRprTopologyOpenRing
h3cRprTopologyOpenRing.description: The topology openRing trap indicates that the RPR ring is opened.

h3cRprTopologyCloseRing.name: h3cRprTopologyCloseRing
h3cRprTopologyCloseRing.description: The topology openRing trap indicates that the RPR ring is closed.

h3cRprTopologyInconsistent.name: h3cRprTopologyInconsistent
h3cRprTopologyInconsistent.description: The topology inconsistent trap indicates that the topology of RPR is inconsistent.

h3cRprTopologyInstability.name: h3cRprTopologyInstability
h3cRprTopologyInstability.description: The topology instability trap indicates that the topology of RPR is instability.

h3cRprDuplicateMacAddress.name: h3cRprDuplicateMacAddress
h3cRprDuplicateMacAddress.description: The duplicate MAC address trap indicates that the mac address of the station on the ring is dulplicate. That means there is the same MAC address between two stations on the ring.

h3cRprDulplicateIPAddress.name: h3cRprDulplicateIPAddress
h3cRprDulplicateIPAddress.description: The dulplicate IP address trap indicates that the IP address of the station on the ring is dulplicate. That means there is the same IP address between two stations on the ring.

h3cRprIncompleteLRTT.name: h3cRprIncompleteLRTT
h3cRprIncompleteLRTT.description: The incomplete LRTT trap indicates that LRTT is not completed.

h3cRprProtecConfigInconsistent.name: h3cRprProtecConfigInconsistent
h3cRprProtecConfigInconsistent.description: The protection configuration inconsistent trap indicates that the configuration of protection mode on the ring is inconsistent. That is one station is configured steer mode while the other is configured wrap mode.

h3cRprJumboConfigInconsistent.name: h3cRprJumboConfigInconsistent
h3cRprJumboConfigInconsistent.description: The jumbo configuration inconsistent trap indicates that the configuration of jumbo mode on the ring is inconsistent. That is one station supports jumbo frame while the other doesn't support jumbo frame.

h3cRprExceedMaxReservRate.name: h3cRprExceedMaxReservRate
h3cRprExceedMaxReservRate.description: The exceeded max reserved rate trap indicates that the rate on the ringlet exceeded the max reserved rate. The operator can configure reserved rate for every station, but the sum of all stations' reserved rate of each RPR ringlet can't exceed maximum.

h3cRprExceedMaxStationNum.name: h3cRprExceedMaxStationNum
h3cRprExceedMaxStationNum.description: The exceeded max station number trap indicates that the number of the stations on the ring exceeded the max station number.

h3cRprMiscabling.name: h3cRprMiscabling
h3cRprMiscabling.description: The miscabling trap indicates that the miscabling event occurred.

h3cRprBackPressure.name: h3cRprBackPressure
h3cRprBackPressure.description: The back pressure trap indicates that the backpressure is generated on the ringlet. That is the data flow on the ringlet exceeded the range of rate-limit configured.

h3cRprBackPressureOver.name: h3cRprBackPressureOver
h3cRprBackPressureOver.description: The back pressure over trap indicates that the backpressure is disappeared on the ringlet.
